metadata.name: Art Marshall
metadata.description:
RHYTHM OF THE ACROBATICS

In an age where trust becomes a rare virtue, this piece reminds us of the energy and strength we possess when we comes together as people without the fear of skin colour, size, class or otherwise.
Careful sculpted in a contraposition to celebrate the rhythm of the African acrobatics with their balance, energetic and victory over fear of the unknown. This work aim to constantly remind us of the need to trust irrespective of what life's throw at us or how big the challenge we are facing might be.
